text.name: info1
text.text: A Technōs Japan Corp., foi uma desenvolvedora japonesa de videogames, mais conhecida pelas franquias Double Dragon e Kunio-kun (que inclui Renegade, Super Dodge Ball e River City Ransom).

text.name: info1
text.text: Techno's Japan Corp., was a Japanese developer of video games, best known for the franchises Double Dragon and Kunio-kun (which includes Renegade, Super Dodge Ball and River City Ransom).

text.name: info1
text.text: Technōs Japan Corp., fue una desarrolladora japonesa de videojuegos, más conocida por las franquicias Double Dragon y Kunio-kun (que incluye Renegade, Super Dodge Ball y River City Ransom).

text.name: info1
text.text: Techno's Japan Corp. était un développeur japonais de jeux vidéo, mieux connu pour les franchises Double Dragon et Kunio-kun (qui incluent Renegade, Super Dodge Ball et River City Ransom).
